page.title: 11 Community
page.content: {Attitudes:}Most of the older people feel that the village is much more outward looking than it was. More weekly shopping is done in nearby towns{(Grantham and Newark)}but the village shops are still used for essential items. From a{questionnaire which was distributed, we found that a lot of people wanted better street lighting, but something has already been done about this. Also people wanted a central playing field and a gas main. It was felt that the condition of the footpaths could be improved and the speed limit on some roads lowered. The local residents feel the character of the village hasn't changed too much and it has still kept it's rural atmosphere. It is still a very pleasant place in which to live.
